lines.text: Must be tough being a rich man's daughter.
All I know is that it was a brown Chevy pickup. 78 I think.
Well why didn't you tell me that before?
Andrea I've waited a long time to race at Charlotte. Now there'll be people in that race who'll put me up against the wall and not even think twice about it.
Rome wasn't built in a day.
So much you know about my country.
What's with you two? You are acting like Italian lovers.
Well I'm part Italian and that part's telling me to get the Hell out of here.
